channel.title: VX3Server - 718
channel.description:
[Center][url=http://runezone.com/][img]http://runezone.com/imagehost/images/10020/rslogo.png[/img][/url]
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8Qt_R499aWA
[B][I][U]Quick Join[/U][/I][/B] [B]Homepage:[/B] [url=http://songoda.org/]http://songoda.org/[/url] [B]Play Now(webclient):[/B] http://vx3server.org/rs/
[B]For Whom[/B] Are you new with RuneScape private servers or are you looking for a new challenging server? VX3Server is the one for you!
[B]Why Us[/B] We do everything to make our players happy, we always do our best. We are an server owned by a company called Songoda. Our Goal at Songoda Ltd. is to offer the best service and customer support in the most professional manner possible. Our Staff Team is built of mature, trained, and professional members.
We strive to make the necessary changes to our services to make our customers happy.
[B]Why Now[/B] VX3Server is a brand new server, if you start right now. We have a good economy, working shops, and other fantastic options.
[B]Features[/B] Like before, there will be much features be added in the future. Right now, we do have already some really awesome features that other servers not have. They will be listed below:
[I]- 100% Lucien - 100% Duel Arena(no dupes glitches or anything 100% staking) - 100% Nex - Squeal of Fortune - 100% Skilling - Perfect Training - Perfect Player & NPC Clipping(not more through walls) - Perfect Combat System (flawless PK) - Autocast in Prayer Book - Good XP Rates for Players - DDoS Server Protection - Encrypted Character Files(to protect our players) - Great Community - Less Donator Features(but still some) - No Lag at All - Investments in Server Developers - Perfect Item Switching(great for hybridders) - Of Course 24/7 Online - All Working Chaotics - 100% Nex Armors[/I]
[I]We have much and much more features, just to much to list them up here. We can suggest just to take a look at our server and you will not regret it. [/I]
[B]Media[/B] Keep in your mind, that the server is brand new. We have just taken some pictures with no people playing.
-Will Edit In Pictures Soon-
[B]Homepage:[/B] [url=http://songoda.org/]http://songoda.org/[/url] [B]Play Now(webclient):[/B] http://vx3server.org/rs/ [I]Ask For The Downloadable Client![/I][/CENTER]

item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

You may only have one advertisement per server, if you make any further advertisement topics concerning this server your posting privileges in here will be revoked. This link will take you to your original post.

Good luck.

item.description:
@CrzyLexii wrote:

[Center]

Quick Join
Homepage: http://songoda.org/
Play Now(webclient): http://vx3server.org/rs/

For Whom
Are you new with RuneScape private servers or are you looking for a new challenging server?
VX3Server is the one for you!

Why Us
We do everything to make our players happy, we always do our best. We are an server owned by a company called Songoda. Our Goal at Songoda Ltd. is to offer the best service and customer support in the most professional manner possible. Our Staff Team is built of mature, trained, and professional members.

We strive to make the necessary changes to our services to make our customers happy.

Why Now
VX3Server is a brand new server, if you start right now. We have a good economy, working shops, and other fantastic options.

Features
Like before, there will be much features be added in the future. Right now, we do have already some really awesome features that other servers not have.
They will be listed below:

[I]- 100% Lucien

  • 100% Duel Arena(no dupes glitches or anything 100% staking)
  • 100% Nex
  • Squeal of Fortune
  • 100% Skilling
  • Perfect Training
  • Perfect Player & NPC Clipping(not more through walls)
  • Perfect Combat System (flawless PK)
  • Autocast in Prayer Book
  • Good XP Rates for Players
  • DDoS Server Protection
  • Encrypted Character Files(to protect our players)
  • Great Community
  • Less Donator Features(but still some)
  • No Lag at All
  • Investments in Server Developers
  • Perfect Item Switching(great for hybridders)
  • Of Course 24/7 Online
  • All Working Chaotics
  • 100% Nex Armors[/I]

We have much and much more features, just to much to list them up here. We can suggest just to take a look at our server and you will not regret it.

Media
Keep in your mind, that the server is brand new. We have just taken some pictures with no people playing.

-Will Edit In Pictures Soon-
